content: Designed UI mockups that focused on simplicity and usability.
Worked with APIs to create a currency converter, retrieve relevant news articles, and any stock related information (open and close prices, highs and lows, and others).
Integrated a Python script that took into account, a stock history ranging 4 years, and produced a predicted opening price.
Implemented Google Firebase as cloud storage (meal / calorie tracker, user health data, fitness goals, etc) and user-authentication purposes.
Calculated userâ€™s BMI using data users filled in during the onboarding process.
Integrated Apple HealthKit to retrieve calories user had burned, steps and distances user had travelled, as well as daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly averages.
Developed using Ionic and Angular JS.
A way to see current Premier League matches and track scores for all teams, as well as view the Premier League tale to get an idea of the front-runners and those facing possible relegation.
Developed using Ionic and Angular JS.
An all-in-one location to store, track and view my experiences as I navigate the tech landscape.
Developed using React, Gatsby and Material UI.
